BG3_Quest01.name: Descent From Avernus
BG3_Quest01.description: Take control of the nautiloid and escape the Hells.

BG3_Quest02.name: The Plot Thickens
BG3_Quest02.description: Leave Act I - for somewhere altogether darker.

BG3_Quest03.name: The City Awaits
BG3_Quest03.description: Leave Act II - Baldur's Gate is just over the horizon.

BG3_Quest04.name: All's Well That Ends Well
BG3_Quest04.description: Finish the game (with a heartfelt 'thank you!' from Larian Studios).

BG3_Quest05.name: Absolute Power Corrupts
BG3_Quest05.description: Reign with terror: take control of the Netherbrain and bend the world to your will.

BG3_Quest06.name: Hero of the Forgotten Realms
BG3_Quest06.description: Save the realms: destroy the Absolute once and for all.

BG3_Quest07.name: Sins of the Father
BG3_Quest07.description: Claim your Throne of Blood: take control of the Netherbrain for Bhaal and break the world.

BG3_Quest08.name: Ceremorphosis
BG3_Quest08.description: Make the ultimate sacrifice: become a mind flayer to defeat the Netherbrain.

BG3_Quest09.name: Roleplayer
BG3_Quest09.description: Complete ten background goals in a single playthrough - you are one with your character.

BG3_Quest10.name: Bedrolls and Breakfast
BG3_Quest10.description: Take four full Long Rests in a single playthrough - adventuring's tiring work.

BG3_Quest11.name: Expand Your Mind
BG3_Quest11.description: Consume a parasite and unlock a new power - is it meant to wriggle the whole way down?

BG3_Quest12.name: Dig for Victory
BG3_Quest12.description: Dig up five buried chests in a single playthrough - treasure!

BG3_Quest13.name: No Penny Required
BG3_Quest13.description: Successfully use Detect Thoughts to pry into someone's thoughts.

BG3_Quest14.name: Escapologist
BG3_Quest14.description: Break out of prison after being arrested - aren't you daring?

BG3_Quest15.name: Outsourcing
BG3_Quest15.description: Recruit a hireling. You can befriend them or use them as cannon-fodder - we won't judge.

BG3_Quest16.name: Jack-of-all-Trades
BG3_Quest16.description: Multiclass into every class in one playthrough without asking Withers to change your character.

BG3_Quest17.name: Homebrewer
BG3_Quest17.description: Create three unique alchemical solutions in a single playthrough - bottoms up!

BG3_Quest18.name: You Have Two Hands for a Reason
BG3_Quest18.description: Pet Scratch and the owlbear cub at the same time - the greatest joy an adventurer could ask for.

BG3_Quest19.name: Rude, Crude, and Full of Attitude
BG3_Quest19.description: Find and summon the quasit Shovel. Or is her name... Fork? Maybe Basket?

BG3_Quest20.name: Forged in Blood and Fire
BG3_Quest20.description: Craft an item in the Adamantine Forge.

BG3_Quest21.name: Under Lock and Key
BG3_Quest21.description: Rescue all the prisoners from the depths of Moonrise Towers in one playthrough.

BG3_Quest23.name: Taking Blood
BG3_Quest23.description: Steal the Blood of Lathander from underneath Rosymorn Monastery.

BG3_Quest25.name: Murder in Baldur's Gate
BG3_Quest25.description: Coat the streets of Baldur's Gate in blood - become an Unholy Assassin of Bhaal.

BG3_Quest27.name: Kill Two Birds With One Gnome
BG3_Quest27.description: Use one enemy as an improvised weapon against another.

BG3_Quest28.name: Busker
BG3_Quest28.description: Earn a hundred gold from playing sweet, sweet music in a single playthrough.

BG3_Quest29.name: Action Surge
BG3_Quest29.description: Perform five attacks in one turn. Your enemies won't know what hit them (literally).

BG3_Quest30.name: Fists of Fury
BG3_Quest30.description: Kill a character with an Unarmed Strike.

BG3_Quest31.name: Devil's in the Details
BG3_Quest31.description: Defeat Commander Zhalk on the nautiloid.

BG3_Quest32.name: Pest Control
BG3_Quest32.description: Kill the Spider Matriarch before her eggs hatch - why do they have so many legs?

BG3_Quest33.name: A Grym Fate
BG3_Quest33.description: Kill the Adamantine Golem without using the Forge Hammer.

BG3_Quest34.name: Non-Invasive Procedure
BG3_Quest34.description: Kill the Surgeon before he performs surgery on you in combat.

BG3_Quest35.name: Penny Pincher
BG3_Quest35.description: Defeat the Toll Collector without her using gold against you - excellent budgeting.

BG3_Quest36.name: No Free Lunches
BG3_Quest36.description: Defeat the Apostle of Myrkul before it consumes any necromites.

BG3_Quest37.name: Fancy Footwork
BG3_Quest37.description: Defeat Gortash in Wyrm's Rock without activating any traps.

BG3_Quest38.name: First Blood
BG3_Quest38.description: Kill Orin while her cultists are performing their ritual chant.

BG3_Quest39.name: Interfectorem Draconis
BG3_Quest39.description: Kill the red dragon in the Upper City.

BG3_Quest40.name: Crash Landing
BG3_Quest40.description: In the Wyrmway, wait until the dragon is mid-flight, then knock it out of the sky - KAPOW.

BG3_Quest41.name: Bottoms Up
BG3_Quest41.description: Long Rest using only alcohol - a time-honoured dwarven tradition.

BG3_Quest42.name: Shove Off
BG3_Quest42.description: Kill a creature with falling damage.

BG3_Quest43.name: Bookworm
BG3_Quest43.description: Read 100 different books in a single playthrough. Adventuring isn't just daring quests, you know.

BG3_Quest44.name: Punch Drunk
BG3_Quest44.description: Defeat twenty opponents while drunk - down them.

BG3_Quest45.name: Fetch Quest
BG3_Quest45.description: Play fetch with Scratch - the best boy in the Realms.

BG3_Quest47.name: The Lich-Queen's Wrath
BG3_Quest47.description: Ally with Voss against the githyanki God-Queen. Good luck.

BG3_Quest48.name: To Bloom in Darkest Night
BG3_Quest48.description: Gift Shadowheart a night orchid - her favourite flower. Always knew she was a softie.

BG3_Quest49.name: Hot Date
BG3_Quest49.description: Go on a date with Karlach - now that's playing with fire.

BG3_Quest50.name: Just a Nibble
BG3_Quest50.description: Let Astarion bite you at night - ouch.

BG3_Quest52.name: Embrace Your Urge
BG3_Quest52.description: Become Bhaal's ultimate weapon - become his Slayer.

BG3_Quest53.name: Critical Hit
BG3_Quest53.description: Complete the game in Tactician mode.

BG3_Quest54.name: Foehammer
BG3_Quest54.description: Complete the game in Honour mode.

ACH_KillAndroidsWithBarrel1.name: Contents Under Pressure
ACH_KillAndroidsWithBarrel1.description: Kill an enemy with an Explosive Barrel

ACH_Die10.name: I live... I die. I live... I die. I live... I die.

ACH_CompleteMission_Hard.name: Hardcore
ACH_CompleteMission_Hard.description: Complete a Mission on at least Hard Difficulty

ACH_CompleteMission_Expert.name: Express Elevator to Hell
ACH_CompleteMission_Expert.description: Complete a Mission on at least Expert Difficulty

ACH_CompleteMission_Nightmare.name: Bad Dreams
ACH_CompleteMission_Nightmare.description: Complete a Mission on Nightmare Difficulty

ACH_TechUpgrades1.name: Gaining Power
ACH_TechUpgrades1.description: Upgrade a Tech Mastery for the first time

ACH_TechUpgrades2.name: Feeling Good
ACH_TechUpgrades2.description: Upgrade at least 3 Tech Masteries to Tier 5

ACH_TechUpgrades3.name: Plot Armor
ACH_TechUpgrades3.description: Upgrade all of your Tech Masteries to MAX Tier

ACH_SuperUpgrades1.name: Getting an Upgrade
ACH_SuperUpgrades1.description: Upgrade a Superior Item for the first time

ACH_SuperUpgrades2.name: This Ainâ€™t Standard Issue
ACH_SuperUpgrades2.description: Upgrade at least 3 Superior Items to Tier 3

ACH_SuperUpgrades3.name: Maxed Out
ACH_SuperUpgrades3.description: Upgrade all of your Superior Items to MAX Tier

ACH_FabricateAny.name: Fabricate a Beer
ACH_FabricateAny.description: Make your first purchase at the Fabricator

ACH_FabricateLegendary.name: Ooo, Shiny!
ACH_FabricateLegendary.description: Purchase a Legendary item at the Fabricator

ACH_LoadoutLegendary.name: Blinged Out
ACH_LoadoutLegendary.description: Have a Loadout of all Legendary Equipment

ACH_CompleteMission_All_Hard.name: Hardcore to the Max
ACH_CompleteMission_All_Hard.description: Complete every Mission on at least Hard Difficulty

ACH_CompleteMission_All_Expert.name: Death Incarnate
ACH_CompleteMission_All_Expert.description: Complete every Mission on at least Expert Difficulty

ACH_CompleteMission_All_Nightmare.name: I am the Nightmare
ACH_CompleteMission_All_Nightmare.description: Complete every Mission on Nightmare Difficulty

ACH_ReadAllDataLogs.name: Too Long, Didn't Read
ACH_ReadAllDataLogs.description: Read all of the Data Logs

ACH_ActivateSynergy.name: Item Alchemist
ACH_ActivateSynergy.description: Activate a Synergy for the first time

ACH_ActivateSynergy3.name: Feeling the Power
ACH_ActivateSynergy3.description: Have 3 Synergies active at the same time

ACH_SynergiesActivated.name: Promote Synergy
ACH_SynergiesActivated.description: Activate each Synergy at least once

ACH_SILVER_02_F.name: Bound by Fate's Threads
ACH_SILVER_02_F.description: Achieve the "Bound by Fate's Threads" ending

ACH_SILVER_07_F.name: Commander - Honglan
ACH_SILVER_07_F.description: Encounter Honglan at the Tang Emperor's Palace

ACH_SILVER_08_F.name: Eternal Glory - Zhao Yun's Spirit
ACH_SILVER_08_F.description: Defeat Eternal Glory - Zhao Yun's Spirit

ACH_SILVER_11_F.name: Dragon Emperor - Zhu Youjian's Obsession
ACH_SILVER_11_F.description: Defeat Dragon Emperor - Zhu Youjian's Obsession

ACH_COPPER_03_F.name: Wielder of Power
ACH_COPPER_03_F.description: Enhance a weapon to the maximum

ACH_COPPER_18_F.name: General of the North - Ai Nengqi
ACH_COPPER_18_F.description: Defeat General of the North - Ai Nengqi

ACH_COPPER_20_F.name: Mistress of the Night - Huang Yan
ACH_COPPER_20_F.description: Defeat Mistress of the Night - Huang Yan

ACH_COPPER_25_F.name: I Call Thee
ACH_COPPER_25_F.description: Summon an NPC to aid you

ACH_COPPER_34_F.name: Well Traveled
ACH_COPPER_34_F.description: Fully unlock all of Tao Qing's stock

ACH_COPPER_35_F.name: Shop of Plenty
ACH_COPPER_35_F.description: Fully unlock all of Wu Gang's stock

ACHIEVEMENT_00.name: I'm gonna show you something X-traordinary!

ACHIEVEMENT_15.name: Bey Collector
ACHIEVEMENT_15.description: Acquired a total of 300 Bey parts.

ACHIEVEMENT_19.name: Xtreme Dash Master
ACHIEVEMENT_19.description: Performed 100 Xtreme Dashes in Auto Chase.

ACHIEVEMENT_26.name: Bonding with Masato
ACHIEVEMENT_26.description: Maxed out the bond level with Masato Akechi.

ACHIEVEMENT_27.name: Bonding with Natsu
ACHIEVEMENT_27.description: Maxed out the bond level with Natsu Shiranui.

ACHIEVEMENT_28.name: Bonding with Aoi
ACHIEVEMENT_28.description: Maxed out the bond level with Aoi Harukaze.

ACHIEVEMENT_29.name: Proof of Bonding
ACHIEVEMENT_29.description: Defeated Hayate Kurohane in Full Power Mode.

ACHIEVEMENT_30.name: Xtreme Dash Shadow Blade Walking
ACHIEVEMENT_30.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash Shadow Blade Walking".

ACHIEVEMENT_31.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash Double".

ACHIEVEMENT_32.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash Infinite".

ACHIEVEMENT_38.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash Mirror Reflection".

ACHIEVEMENT_39.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash King of the Beasts".

ACHIEVEMENT_41.description: Saw the X Skill "The Shadow that Cannot Be Touched".

ACHIEVEMENT_42.description: Saw the X Skill "Xtreme Dash Dragonic Break".

0005.name: Nothing Is Impossible!
0005.description: Complete all side quests (excluding add-on content)

0007.name: Fate Can't Wait
0007.description: Complete all characters' fate episodes, including their epilogues (excluding add-on content)

0008.name: Reminiscence
0008.description: Fill in every Field Notes entry in Lyria's Journal (excluding add-on content)

0009.name: True Potential
0009.description: Unlock the power of an Ascension weapon for the first time

0020.name: Leave It to Me
0020.description: Achieve an S++ quest evaluation for the first time

0023.name: I Try to Help
0023.description: Complete a side quest for the first time

0028.name: About to Full Burst
0028.description: Trigger a full burst in battle (excluding certain battles)

0029.name: Don't Think It Goes Higher Than That
0029.description: Deal more than 999,999 damage with a chain burst in battle

0030.name: In Perfect Sync
0030.description: Enter link time in battle (excluding Training)

0031.name: Chain Burst Champion
0031.description: Activate chain bursts 100 times in battles (excluding certain battles)

0032.name: No Holding Back
0032.description: Unleash Skybound Arts 10 times in battles (excluding certain battles)

0035.name: Buff Buffet
0035.description: Use buffing skills to grant status effects to allies 20 times in battles

0036.name: Debuff Deluge
0036.description: Use debuffing skills to inflict status ailments on foes 20 times in battle

0038.name: Give Me Something to Break
0038.description: Put foes into Break 5 times in battles (excluding certain battles)

0039.name: A Fateful Encounter
0039.description: Complete a fate episode prologue for the first time

0042.name: I Like It When Numbers Go Up

0047.name: Practice Makes Perfect
0047.description: Get some practice in with Sir Barrold

0048.name: No Cap
0048.description: Uncap a weapon at the blacksmith

0049.name: Knickknack Shack Regular
0049.description: Use Siero's Treasure Trade to complete 10 trades

0050.name: On the Road to Mastery
0050.description: Unlock a character action node from Masteries for the first time
